humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, 11 lymph nodes were assessed and all of them were negative for tumor. This matches with the new rule 11, which states that N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that 11 lymph nodes were negative for tumor. The N stage is determined by the number of lymph nodes with metastatic cancer. Since none of the 11 nodes had cancer, the N stage is N0.
